item.title: Formatting Markdown
item.author: imvincy@outlook.com (Vincy Huang)
item.dc:creator: Vincy Huang
item.description:
On configuration settings – themes/hugo-brewm/congif.toml

  • title = ‘Example’ changes the top left icon.

Go to Site parameters section:

  • Change any field that requires customization.

Go to Author information section:

  • Change any field to fill in author info for this site.

Go to comments configuration section:

  • You can enable / disable comments .

Go to Logo configuration:

  • Insert new logo mark.
